channel.title: Magic Help?

item.title: Magic Help?
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

Was with same problems as you earlier… changed to this and working now…

public int getFreezeTimer(int spell) { if (spell == 12861) { return 10000; } if (spell == 12881) { return 20000; } if (spell == 12871) { return 30000; } if (spell == 12891) { return 30000; } if (spell == 1572) { return 10000; } if (spell == 1582) { return 20000; } if (spell == 1592) { return 30000; } return 30; }

Hope it will for for you too.

Read full topic

item.title: Magic Help?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Okay so like, when I freeze someone in game, they can still attack even if you run away. Also the freeze timer is off.
This is the code I found in client.java

} public int getFreezeTimer(int spell) { if (spell == 12861) { return 5000; } if (spell == 12881) { return 10000; } if (spell == 12871) { return 15000; } if (spell == 12891) { return 20000; } if (spell == 1572) { return 5000; } if (spell == 1582) { return 10000; } if (spell == 1592) { return 15000; } return 30; }

I’m not sure what the returns mean so…yeah… Any help on fixing the timer and or far meleeing?

Read full topic
